wideningTuples6.ts(2,1): error TS2322: Type '""' is not assignable to type 'undefined'.
wideningTuples6.ts(3,1): error TS2322: Type '""' is not assignable to type 'null'.


==== wideningTuples6.ts (2 errors) ====
    var [a, b] = [undefined, null];
    a = "";
    ~
!!! error TS2322: Type '""' is not assignable to type 'undefined'.
    b = "";
    ~
!!! error TS2322: Type '""' is not assignable to type 'null'.
